metadata.title: envoy: Envoy crashes when idle and request per try timeout occur within the backoff interval (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in the Envoy proxy. Envoy will crash when certain timeouts happen within the same interval. The crash occurs when hedge_on_per_try_timeout is enabled,  per_try_idle_timeout is enabled (it can only be done in configuration), and per-try-timeout is enabled, either through headers or configuration and its value is equal or within the backoff interval of the per_try_idle_timeout.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
servicemesh-proxy is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
